full_text: The vaccine mandate debate has made it to Dr. Fauci's own workplace. One of his top scientists isn't vaccinated and says mandates are wrong. https://t.co/6POSY2jZTL

localize.full_text: ワクチン義務化の議論は、Fauci博士自身の職場にも及んでいます。トップ科学者の一人はワクチンを接種しておらず、義務化は間違っていると言っています。https://t.co/6POSY2jZTL
